question: Can you find information about the latest Mars rover and generate a conceptual image of its landing?
true_answer: The latest Mars rover is named Perseverance, launched by NASA as part of the Mars 2020 mission. A conceptual image of its landing has been generated.

What are the main objectives of the Perseverance rover mission?
Plan: 1) Search for the main objectives of the Perseverance rover mission. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for the main objectives of the Perseverance rover mission.
The main objectives of the Perseverance rover are to search for signs of ancient life, collect rock and soil samples, and prepare for future human exploration.

The latest Mars rover is named Perseverance, launched by NASA as part of the Mars 2020 mission. A conceptual image of its landing has been generated. Its main objectives include searching for signs of ancient life, collecting rock and soil samples, and preparing for future human exploration.
